original_text: But she wanted more and more men to be her lovers. She remembered how she had lived as a prostitute in Egypt when she was a young woman.
korean_text: 그가 그의 음행을 더하여 젊었을 때 곧 애굽 땅에서 행음하던 때를 생각하고

sentences.original_text: But she wanted more and more men
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그녀는 점점 더 많은 남자들을 원했다

sentences.original_text: She remembered how she had lived
when she was a young woman
